title: Help
content: After entering college through lateral entry in the third semester, I experienced an accident that kept me away from classes for most of the third and fourth semesters. Despite this, I earned a SGPA of 6.5 in the third semester and 7 in the fourth semester. Is it possible for me to strive for a CGPA of at least 8.5 by the end of the eighth semester?

comments.body: You will have only 2 semesters left (the last two semesters hardly account for much credits), give it your best shot don’t worry about the end results, just keep grinding.

Thank you.
I hope to atleast touch 8 CGPA

Although 8 is good 

I would suggest to at least try getting >= 7.75 CGPA. Then you mostly wouldn't have to worry about the CGPA being a barrier
